(Olunkinamaka natappavan umatu kutumpattaic carntavanalla.) Atalal, nir umakkut teriyata visayankalaip parri ennitam (tarkkittuk) ketka ventam; ariyatavarkalil nirum oruvarakivita ventam enru niccayamaka nan umakku nallupatecam ceykiren'' enru kurinan
